description: Yeehaa is a seasoned tech manager and consultant with a strong background in software engineering and project management. Their work focuses on ecosystem architecture, innovation, and sustainable design. Yeehaa's blog posts explore topics like biological ecosystems, internet fragmentation, and regenerative innovation. They emphasize the importance of decentralized systems and resilient organizations. Yeehaa has also curated a course on "Grooming Your Ecosystem," which covers leadership, adaptability, creativity, and design. Their approach combines academic insights with practical expertise to drive efficiency and foster innovation across various industries.
blurb: Yeehaa is a tech manager and consultant exploring ecosystem architecture, innovation, and sustainable design. They emphasize decentralized systems, resilience, and regenerative practices in their work and writings.
